select * from company where
com_job1 like concat('%', #{item}, '%')
or
com_job2 like concat('%', #{item}, '%')
or
com_country like concat('%', #{item}, '%')
or
com_city like concat('%', #{item}, '%')
or
com_edu_level like concat('%', #{item}, '%')
or
com_major like concat('%', #{item}, '%')
or
com_license like concat('%', #{item}, '%')
or
com_sal_name = #{item}
or
com_benefits like concat('%', #{item}, '%')
or
com_work_period like concat('%', #{item}, '%')
or
com_work_days = '월,화,수,목,금'
com_work_days = '토,일'
or
com_work_days = #{com_work_day}
or
(com_start_time >= 6 and com_start_time <= 12 and com_end_time >= 6 and com_end_time <= 12)
(com_start_time >= 12 and com_start_time <= 18 and com_end_time >= 12 and com_end_time <= 18)
(com_start_time >= 18 and com_start_time <= 24 and com_end_time >= 18 and com_end_time <= 24)
(com_start_time >= 0 and com_start_time <= 6 and com_end_time >= 0 and com_end_time <= 6)
(com_start_time >= 6 and com_start_time <= 18 and com_end_time >= 6 and com_end_time <= 18)
(com_start_time >= 12 and com_start_time <= 24 and com_end_time >= 12 and com_end_time <= 24)
(com_start_time >= 18 and com_start_time <= 6 and com_end_time >= 18 and com_end_time <= 6)
(com_start_time >= 0 and com_start_time <= 12 and com_end_time >= 0 and com_end_time <= 12)
abs(com_end_time - com_start_time) >= 8
order by com_no desc
